solution_line_template: The number of boxes already sold is {lemon_boxes_sold} + {chocolate_boxes_sold} + {oatmeal_boxes_sold} = <<{lemon_boxes_sold}+{chocolate_boxes_sold}+{oatmeal_boxes_sold}={total_boxes_sold}>>{total_boxes_sold}.
Kaylee needs to sell {total_boxes_needed} − {total_boxes_sold} = {boxes_remaining_to_sell} more boxes.
